headline: Will Ella CE-IVD Approval in EU Clinical Labs Change Bio-Techne's (TECH) Diagnostic Platform Narrative?
summary: Earlier this month, Bio-Techne announced that its Ella benchtop immunoassay platform received CE-IVD marking and is now available for clinical use across the European Union, enabling faster, standardized biomarker testing with minimal hands-on time. This certification not only broadens Ella’s potential adoption in hospitals and clinical labs, but also positions the platform as a foundation for in-house test development and future diagnostic applications using Bio-Techne’s extensive Simple...
